channel.title: Owners/Admins Cant get Loot?
channel.description: Okay, so im owner on my server and i want to help people kill bosses n stuff, but when i get a drop it says "item vanishes as it touches the ground" does this for admin and owner? and one know how to change this? Does this when u kill players too, only for admins and owner ofc, normal players get loot fine

item.title: Owners/Admins Cant get Loot?
item.dc:creator: @Morgan_Linder Morgan Linder
item.description:
@Morgan_Linder wrote:

i dont want to get loot from players, but from npcs, it would be nice as owner to be able to help people out.

Read full topic

item.title: Owners/Admins Cant get Loot?
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

i bet you admins cant trade or drop either…

i believe this is added to prevent admins from helping the players… e.g an admin will come and kill a boss then leaves it for another player to get… i think this is a good feature actually and u shouldnt remove…
after all why do u want to get loot off players anyways… prevents hacking too

Read full topic
